audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
So when I was born in China
in the early 1980s,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: my country was still a place of scarcity.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
We lived on rationed food,
cooked from communal kitchens

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
and even in Beijing had three nights
of blackouts every week.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
I remember reading poems
with my father by candlelight.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
A special memory from times
when Chinese people had little.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: And fast forward three decades,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
China has turned
into a country of abundance,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
especially when it comes
to technological power.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
From high tech to business tech
to everyday tech,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
there isn't anything you can't find,
only things you can't imagine.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
I can buy a can of Coke
by scanning my face.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: A few years ago,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
I called for toothpaste
from my hotel room,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: and it was delivered to me by a robot.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
I've seen people live in remote Tibetan
mountains blast off cool music

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: with Walkmans powered by solar cells

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
and Chinese solar technology
light up homes for African kids

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
who used to study by candlelight,
just like me when I was growing up.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
So this striking swell
of innovation happened

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
even though China remains
a developing country,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
with just a little more
than 10,000 dollars of per capita GDP.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
So today I want to offer you
a different lens to look through,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
one that shows a unique model
that has fostered innovation

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: and technological growth.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: Now the system is far from perfect.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
And like you, I worry about the rising
tensions of a tech race and beyond.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
But I also believe
that, as in any relationship,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: a better understanding of each other

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
is going to help us more likely to find
common goals to work on

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
rather than a downward
spiral that harms all.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: So I'm an economist,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
straddling multiple worlds,
as it turns out.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
One foot in London,
where I do my research.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: And one foot in China,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
where I spend time with my family
and also do a bit of work.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: And if I had a third foot,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
it would be in the US,
where I was educated.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
So I can totally see why
there's so much misunderstanding

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
and incomprehension
about this megacountry

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: that has defied conventional wisdom.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
So let's start out
with how China's innovating.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Now, innovation isn't just
about inventing the next new thing,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
like the iPhone or 3D printing
or sending people to Mars.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: Technologies that go from zero to one.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
It could be new applications,
business models,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: better processes that lower costs.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
These one-to-n innovations
are just as important.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Whatever makes us leaner,
cleaner and more productive,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: all count.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
So TikTok might not be
the first short-video app,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
but it has garnered more
than a billion users around the world.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
The Chinese EV company, BYD,
didn't make the first prototype.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: But compared to Tesla's price point,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: the 15,000-dollars EV cabs that I've taken

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: with half a million kilometers of range

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
can meaningfully lead to lower
emissions and mass adoption.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: And in the same way,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Chinese mobile phones
might not be as revolutionary as iPhone,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
but in African countries,
their market share is well over half.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
So this actually solves one big problem
for developing countries,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
which is the lack of access to suitable
technologies that they can actually use.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
And even if China doesn't do many
zero-to-one technologies yet --

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: at least not yet --

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
it doesn't mean that it can't
master high tech, right?

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: It conducted the first quantum video call,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
and it launched the first drone
that can carry a passenger in air.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: So let's go behind the scenes.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Now, yes, many of you would say
China's got money, markets, talent

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
and troves of data, which is so critical
in this information age.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: But it wasn't just that.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Part of the success was also
a "whole nation" approach,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: or what they call a "juguo" system.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
So turning an idea or scientific discovery
into commercial success

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: requires an innovation ecosystem.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
The collaboration of universities,
national labs and industries,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: not to mention enormous amount of funding

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
that covers long
and uncertain investment cycles.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: Now, many of you might think

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
that groundbreaking technologies
are the products of stars,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: the likes of Steve Jobs or Elon Musks.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: But every time you use the internet,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: the GPS or yell at your Alexa,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: you have the US government to thank for.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
We often forget that the Apollo program,
the Manhattan Project,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
even Japan's rise
to semiconductor stardom,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
were all horizontal systems
with critical state backing.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Now, China's "juguo" system
is an entire nation

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: behind one strategic goal.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Mobilizing national resources,
casting the net wide,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: not tallying costs.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
And it’s the same system
that’s used to reap

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: as many Olympic gold medals as possible.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: And so thanks to this ecosystem,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
China became the largest consumer
and producers of EVs

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: in less than a decade.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: With more cars sold there

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
than in the rest of the world
combined in 2020.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: Now in the West,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
we often talk about "nudging" consumers
to make better choices.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
But in China, mass adoption of next-gen
transportation happened like that.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Well, in part thanks to the state
rolling out four million charging stations

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: around the country,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
coordinating supply chains
from battery makers to control systems

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: and manufacturers.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Today, there are 140,000 chargers
in the US in the entire country.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
So that is kind of,
the "whole nation" approach.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
But that's not actually
the story I want to tell you.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
There's an even more nuanced story
that happens on the ground.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: We call it the “mayor economy,”

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: and it's a decentralized economic model

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
that galvanizes creativity
from the ground up.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: And contrary to popular perception,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
it isn't a centralized approach
dominated by an almighty state.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: And so here's how it works.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
So Nio is one of the top three
EV companies in China.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Its cars are driven everywhere
on the streets of Beijing and Shanghai.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Now, two years after it was listed
on Nasdaq in 2018,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: it was on the verge of bankruptcy.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: Now, at this point,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: the local government of Hefei,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
a small town in eastern China
with five million people,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
convinced it to move
its headquarters there.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
The local government
injected a billion dollars

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: in exchange for a 25-percent stake,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: arranged more loans for the company

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: and most importantly,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
organized an entire
supply chain around Nio.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
It took only a year before Nio's
production grew by 81 percent,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
its market cap went
from four to 100 billion dollars.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
And the local government of Hefei
cashed out within a year,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: and Nio's life was saved.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
And so for every local
government behind a Nio,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: there's another mayor behind a competitor.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
And there are literally hundreds
of EV companies vying for survival

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: in ruthless competition.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: So,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
if you are actually
a promising tech company,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
local governments
will move mountains to help.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: Remove red tape, check.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: Find you more financing, check.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: Get a job for your spouse, check.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: Piece of cake.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
They are a one-stop shop,
as they like to call themselves.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Now in the vigorous bid
for Amazon's second headquarters,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: there were some creative offers.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: One state sent a giant cactus as a gift.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Another state offered
to rename a town Amazon.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: But it basically came to some tax breaks,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
not quite like what the Chinese
mayors had to offer.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: But of course,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
the US government is no stranger
to supporting big-shot companies

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
like SpaceX and Tesla,
offering billions in benefits.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
But in China, it's really this marriage
between hyper-charged local officials

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: and intrepid entrepreneurs of all ilk

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: that is at the heart of its model.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: And here's why.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: So the local government of Hefei,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: the one that made a killing with Nio,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
well, it wasn't just after
the return on investment, per se.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: But it was by luring companies like Nio

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
that it’s looking to create
a mini Silicon Valley of sorts.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: An industrial clutter, a talent pool,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: a flourishing retail and service industry

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
that gets them more jobs,
more tax revenues.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: And guess what?

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Even the real estate and land they own
are suddenly worth more,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
all because of the economics
of agglomeration and multiplier effects,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
because the local mayors are actually
an equity stakeholder of the entire city.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: So in sum,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: it's this political centralization

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: and economic decentralization

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
that is actually a simple
representation of China's model.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
It's the same model used to urbanize,
to grow and now to innovate.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: Now, for all of its successes,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: there were huge costs, I admit.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: Waste left in the wake,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: inefficient investments, wrong bets.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Now, some of these challenges
are being addressed, thankfully,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: like environmental degradation,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
but there are others that remain
in urgent need of fixing.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
So I'm not suggesting
that there's some universal recipe

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: or that it's perfect

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: or that it can be easily replicated.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
But what we do know is that there's more
than one way of making things work.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
And recognizing that there is
some wisdom to China's approach

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: doesn't mean endorsing all of it.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
But I guess there's something
to learn from each other.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: And for one,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
China didn't sit on the tarmac
waiting for a technological takeoff.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Instead, it was the big push
from the ground up.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
So I came to the US
as an exchange student in 1997,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: and I was mesmerized.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
I saw enormous possibility
between the East and the West,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
as they competed, collaborated
and spurred each other forward.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: I still believe in this,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: even though frost has set in

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
and there may be chill
in the air for some time

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
between the two largest
economies in the world.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Some may fear China's
juggernaut innovation.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Some may not like competition,
which is rarely comfortable.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: But having someone in your rearview mirror

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: helps you keep up the pace.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: Japan's technological rise in the 1980s

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
pushed the US to overhaul
its innovation system

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: and regain the lead in the 1990s.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
The US subsequently
did the same for Japan,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
and as a result, we all have cheaper
and better products.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Today, Chinese EV company BYD is pushing
Tesla to new heights and vice versa.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: Tesla opted for a Chinese battery maker,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
which is pushing the German government
to do more in that space.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: And it's that mutual learning

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: and constant threat of being overtaken

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
that pushes the technology frontier
further and beyond.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: But one thing's for sure, true,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
it just doesn't happen
in geographical isolation.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: So ...

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
I’ve come here, and I imagine
the possibilities

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: between the two countries,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
and I understand that there are
national security concerns

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: that countries will have to respect.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
But not everything
is about national security.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
The trillion dollars or more at stake
with the economic disengagement

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: between the two largest countries

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
can do so much as eradicate
malaria, end world hunger,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: conserve biodiversity and more.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
So let's not forget that there are
more sacred things in life.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Such as a brighter future
for our children and a cleaner Earth.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Let's not forget
that in the developing world,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: there's still so much unnecessary misery.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
And that its people also have the right
to enjoy the dignity in life

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: as those who are more fortunate.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: And so for all of this to happen,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: it seems to me

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
that what we ultimately need
is the cheapest and best technologies,

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
rather than worry
about where they come from

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: or who will dominate.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: Thank you.

audio: ./Data/wav/What the World Can Learn From China’s Innovation Playbook | Keyu Jin | TED.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: (Applause)

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
You and your friend need to ace 
Friday’s exam to avoid summer classes,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
and after a week of studying, you both
feel confident that you pulled it off.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: But when you get your grades back,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
they’re much lower 
than the two of you expected.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: You’re devastated.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
However, your friend doesn't
seem too bothered,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
and it's making you wonder why you can't
shake this off like they can.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
But should you really be trying
to look on the bright side?

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
And is controlling our emotions 
even possible in the first place?

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
The answer to the last question
is a definitive “yes.”

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
There are numerous strategies
for regulating our emotions,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
and one framework to understand these
techniques is called the Process Model.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Psychologists use this tool to identify
where and how to intervene

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: in the process that forms our emotions.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: That process has four steps:

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
first, we enter a situation, 
real or imagined,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: and that draws our attention.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Then we evaluate, or appraise, 
the situation

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: and whether it helps or hinders our goals.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Finally, this appraisal leads to a set of 
changes in how we feel, think, and behave,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: known as an emotional response.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Each step of this process offers 
an opportunity to consciously intervene

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: and change our emotions,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
and the Process Model outlines what 
strategies we might try at each phase.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
To see this in action, let’s imagine
you’ve been invited to the same party

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
as your least-favorite ex
and their new partner.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Your first strategy could be avoiding
the situation altogether

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: by skipping the party.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
But if you do attend, you could also try 
modifying the situation

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: by choosing not to interact with your ex.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
If that’s proving difficult,
you might want to shift your attention,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: maybe by playing a game with your friends

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
rather than focusing 
on your ex’s new partner.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Another option would be to re-evaluate
how you think about the situation.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: After seriously reappraising things,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
you might realize that you don’t
care who your ex dates.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: If none of these strategies work,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
you can always try tempering 
your emotional response after the fact.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: But this can be tricky.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: Many of the easiest ways to do this,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
like hiding your emotions or trying 
to change them with recreational drugs,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
generally lead to more negative feelings
and health concerns in the long term.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
More sustainable strategies here include
going for a long walk,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
taking slow, deep breaths, or talking 
with someone in your support system.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
While using all these strategies well 
takes practice,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: learning to notice your emotions

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
and reflect on where they’re coming from
is half the battle.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
And once you’ve truly internalized 
that you can regulate your emotions,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: doing so becomes much easier.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
But should you use these techniques 
to constantly maintain a good mood?

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
That answer depends on how you define
what makes a mood “good.”

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
It's tempting to think we should always
try to avoid sadness and frustration,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: but no emotion is inherently good or bad—

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
they’re either helpful or unhelpful
depending on the situation.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
For example, if a friend is telling you
about the loss of a loved one,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
feeling and expressing sadness 
isn’t just appropriate,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
it can help you empathize
and support them.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Conversely, while it’s unhealthy 
to regularly ignore your emotions,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
forcing a smile to get through a one-time
annoyance is perfectly reasonable.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
We hear a lot of mixed messages
about emotions.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: Some pressure us to stay upbeat

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
while others tell us to simply take 
our emotions as they come.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
But in reality,
each person has to find their own balance.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
So if the question is:
“should you always try to be happy?”

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: The answer is no.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
Studies suggest that people 
fixated on happiness

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
often experience secondary
negative emotions,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: like guilt,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: or frustration over being upset,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
and disappointment that they
don't feel happier.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
This doesn't mean you should let
sadness or anger take over.

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
But strategies like reappraisal can help
you re-evaluate

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: your thoughts about a situation,

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text: allowing you to accept that you feel sad

audio: ./Data/wav/How to manage your emotions.248 - 1920x1080 (1080p)+251 - audio only (medium).wav
text:
and cultivate hope 
that things will get better.
